channel.title: Portfolio website
channel.description:
Good day everyone, I just wanted to show everyone my portfolio homepage I have worked on:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wM9zH1J.png[/img]
This page has been Made with:
[ul][li]Html[/li] [li]Css[/li] [li]Javascript[/li][/ul]
Does anyone got suggestions on what I could improve? or tell me what do you like on this page :)
Thanks,
NickB

item.title: Portfolio website
item.dc:creator: @nickb nickb
item.description:
@nickb wrote:

Thanks for this feedback, I thought this would look kinda cool but ohwell.
Gonne have a look at it.

item.title: Portfolio website
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I think there should be a margin to the left of your “NickB” title, and your navigation bar should be aligned to the right part of the wrapper.

Read full topic
